review: This is one of my best acquisitions in streaming technology which I have purchased. I have cancelled my cable subscription and will be streaming all my program content using the Amazon Fire TV Stick and other similar products available on the market. However, the Fire TV Stick, with its remote control, it easily the best of these devices which can provide the services I need with little or no hassle. I highly recommend the Amazon Fire TV Stick for its solid construction and technology and ease of use.
